content:
JScriptException Class

In this Article

The exception that is thrown by JScript to notify a common language runtime (CLR) host or program that an error occurred. A JScriptException usually takes a JSError enumeration value.

Syntax

Declaration

public class JScriptException : ApplicationException, Microsoft.JScript.IVsaFullErrorInfo

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • Exception
  • System.ApplicationException
  • JScriptException

Inherited Members

Data
,
GetBaseException()
,
GetType()
,
HelpLink
,
HResult
,
InnerException
,
SerializeObjectState
,
Source
,
TargetSite
,
ToString()
,
Equals(Object)
,
Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetHashCode()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)

Remarks

A JScriptException is also an IVsaError and can be passed to the host through OnCompilerError.

Constructors summary

JScriptException()

Initializes a new instance of the JScriptException class.
JScriptException(JSError)

Initializes a new instance of the JScriptException class, using the specified JSError.
JScriptException(String)

Initializes a new instance of the JScriptException class, using the specified error message.
JScriptException(SerializationInfo,StreamingContext)

Initializes a new instance of the JScriptException class, using the specified serialized data.
JScriptException(String,Exception)

Initializes a new instance of the JScriptException class, using the specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

Properties summary

Column

Gets the column in the code in which the error occurs.
Description

Gets a message that describes the error.
EndColumn

Gets the column in the code in which the error ends.
EndLine

Gets the line of code in which the error ends.
ErrorNumber

Gets the stem.Exception.HResult* code of the error.
Line

Gets the line of code in which the error occurs.
LineText

Gets the text of the code in which the error occurs.
Message

Gets a message that describes the error.
Number

Gets the stem.Exception.HResult* code of the error.
Severity

Gets a number between 0 (most severe) and 4 (least severe) that indicates the severity of the error. 0 is the default.
SourceItem

Gets the source code item that caused the error.
SourceMoniker

Gets the name of the source code file that contains the error.
StackTrace

Gets the stack trace information at the time of the error.
StartColumn

Gets the column in the code in which the error occurs.

Methods summary

GetObjectData(SerializationInfo,StreamingContext)

Stores information about the exception, including IsError and Code values, in the SerializationInfo.

Explicit Interface Implementations summary

IJSVsaError.Description

Gets a message that describes the error.
IJSVsaError.Number

Gets the stem.Exception.HResult* code of the error.

Constructors

  • JScriptException()

    Initializes a new instance of the JScriptException class.

    public JScriptException ();
  • JScriptException(JSError)

    Initializes a new instance of the JScriptException class, using the specified JSError.

    public JScriptException (Microsoft.JScript.JSError errorNumber);

    Parameters

    • errorNumber
      JSError

      One of the enumeration values. The value specifies the error.

  • JScriptException(String)

    Initializes a new instance of the JScriptException class, using the specified error message.

    public JScriptException (string m);

    Parameters

    • m
      String

      The message that describes the error.

  • JScriptException(SerializationInfo,StreamingContext)

    Initializes a new instance of the JScriptException class, using the specified serialized data.

    protected JScriptException (System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context);

    Parameters

    • info
      SerializationInfo

      The serialized object data about the exception that is being thrown.

    • context
      StreamingContext

      Contextual information about the source or destination.

  • JScriptException(String,Exception)

    Initializes a new instance of the JScriptException class, using the specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

    public JScriptException (string m, Exception e);

    Parameters

    • m
      String

      The message that describes the error.

    • e
      Exception

      The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

Properties

  • Column

    Gets the column in the code in which the error occurs.

    public int Column { get; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The column in the code in which the error occurs, or 0 if the Context is null.

  • Description

    Gets a message that describes the error.

    public string Description { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A message that describes the error.

  • EndColumn

    Gets the column in the code in which the error ends.

    public int EndColumn { get; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The column in the code in which the error ends, or 0 if the Context is null.

  • EndLine

    Gets the line of code in which the error ends.

    public int EndLine { get; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The line of code in which the error ends, or 0 if the Context is null.

  • ErrorNumber

    Gets the stem.Exception.HResult* code of the error.

    public int ErrorNumber { get; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The stem.Exception.HResult* code of the error.

  • Line

    Gets the line of code in which the error occurs.

    public int Line { get; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The line of code in which the error occurs, or 0 if the Context is null.

  • LineText

    Gets the text of the code in which the error occurs.

    public string LineText { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The text of the code, or an empty string if the Context is null.

  • Message

    Gets a message that describes the error.

    public override string Message { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A message that describes the error.

  • Number

    Gets the stem.Exception.HResult* code of the error.

    public int Number { get; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The stem.Exception.HResult* code of the error.

  • Severity

    Gets a number between 0 (most severe) and 4 (least severe) that indicates the severity of the error. 0 is the default.

    public int Severity { get; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      A number between 0 and 4.

  • SourceItem

    Gets the source code item that caused the error.

    public Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaItem SourceItem { get; }

    Property Value

    • IJSVsaItem

      The source code item; or throws a NoContextException if the Context is null.

  • SourceMoniker

    Gets the name of the source code file that contains the error.

    public string SourceMoniker { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The name of the source code file, or the string literal "no source" if the Context is null.

  • StackTrace

    Gets the stack trace information at the time of the error.

    public override string StackTrace { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The stack trace information.

  • StartColumn

    Gets the column in the code in which the error occurs.

    public int StartColumn { get; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The column in the code in which the error occurs, or 0 if the Context is null.

Methods

  • GetObjectData(SerializationInfo,StreamingContext)

    Stores information about the exception, including IsError and Code values, in the SerializationInfo.

    public override void GetObjectData (System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context);

    Parameters

    • info
      SerializationInfo

      The serialized object data about the exception that is being thrown.

    • context
      StreamingContext

      Contextual information about the source or destination.

Explicit Interface Implementations

  • IJSVsaError.Description

    Gets a message that describes the error.

    string Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaError.Description { get; }

    Returns

    • String

      A message that describes the error.

  • IJSVsaError.Number

    Gets the stem.Exception.HResult* code of the error.

    int Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaError.Number { get; }

    Returns

    • Int32

      The stem.Exception.HResult* code of the error.
